title: RIOT, do you want me to quit the game?
body:
lost 5 games in a row, then you randomly picked 2 unranked players and 1 bronze player and a silver 4 in a game with me against 4 silver players and 1 unranked player . im silver 4 btw.

check my match history , so you know what the unranked ppl did

THIS ANIT CALLED GAME ANYMORE!

replies.body: THEY DONT CARE ALL THEY CARE ABOUT IS PROFIT

1) Play solo carry champions because this happens to everyone
2) It might be because your win-rate or the like is low so it's setting you in a match against people your level. 
3) Don't play league if you're that easily swayed? 
4) What can Riot do about it? They were probably in a party with people with a relatively high MMR and Riot isnt going to make it so silver 4 players in a party are playing against bronze 5 or unranked.
